I am 5'10 and tend to feel like a towering giant, which leads to not so body-positive thoughts. I am going to make statuesque a positive intention from now on.

You have no idea how blessed you are.  I'm 5'2", and I've always wanted to be taller like the rest of my siblings.  Over time, I've come to love my height for various reasons, and I hope you will learn to love your statuesque physique as well.  😊❤🌞🌸
